DOC.brief_title: Multiple Dose Comparison Effect Two Dose Combinations Tipranavir/Ritonavir ( TPV/RTV ) , Pharmacokinetic Characteristics Efavirenz ( Sustiva® ) Healthy Adult Volunteers
